title: Intention Setting Workshops 2025!
description: MC and I are thrilled to announce TWO Intention Setting Workshops next month—one in person and one online! Get ready for a powerful day filled with art projects, writing exercises, group processing, letting-go ceremonies, and more. We’ve planned some fun experiences to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead. Mark your calendar—it’s coming up soon! Stay tuned for more details. We can’t wait to create magic together!   Here are the details: In-Person Intention Setting 2025 Saturday, January 4th 1:00PM-5:15PM at CONVERT STUDIOS 306 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, San Anselmo, CA 94960 Price: $250   There will be long tables, pens, paper, art supplies, tea, calendars, and…..     MAGIC!     Here’s what our friend Kebby had to say when she joined us at the beginning of 2024.   Sharing your intentions with others can turn them into reality.   Here’s proof!     And if you can’t make it in person, we are hosting a shorter version ONLINE!     INTENTION SETTING ZOOM CALL Saturday, January 11 10 AM-12 PM LIVE  Includes printables!  Price: $55   Buckle up, 2025, we’re coming for you. And we’ve got sparkles!      Let’s GOOOO!   The post Intention Setting Workshops 2025! appeared first on Shutterbean.

text: MC and I are thrilled to announce TWO Intention Setting Workshops next month—one in person and one online! Get ready for a powerful day filled with art projects, writing exercises, group processing, letting-go ceremonies, and more. We’ve planned some fun experiences to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead. Mark your calendar—it’s coming up soon! Stay tuned for more details. We can’t wait to create magic together! Here are the details: In-Person Intention Setting 2025 Saturday, January 4th 1:00PM-5:15PM at CONVERT STUDIOS 306 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, San Anselmo, CA 94960 Price: $250 There will be long tables, pens, paper, art supplies, tea, calendars, and….. MAGIC! Here’s what our friend Kebby had to say when she joined us at the beginning of 2024. Sharing your intentions with others can turn them into reality. Here’s proof! And if you can’t make it in person, we are hosting a shorter version ONLINE! Saturday, January 11 10 AM-12 PM LIVE  Includes printables!  Buckle up, 2025, we’re coming for you. And we’ve got sparkles!  Let’s GOOOO!
html:
MC and I are thrilled to announce TWO Intention Setting Workshops next month—one in person and one online!

Get ready for a powerful day filled with art projects, writing exercises, group processing, letting-go ceremonies, and more. We’ve planned some fun experiences to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead.

Mark your calendar—it’s coming up soon! Stay tuned for more details. We can’t wait to create magic together!

Here are the details:

In-Person Intention Setting 2025

Saturday, January 4th

1:00PM-5:15PM

at CONVERT STUDIOS

306 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, San Anselmo, CA 94960

Price: $250

There will be long tables, pens, paper, art supplies, tea, calendars, and…..

MAGIC!

Here’s what our friend Kebby had to say when she joined us at the beginning of 2024.

Sharing your intentions with others can turn them into reality.

Here’s proof!

And if you can’t make it in person, we are hosting a shorter version ONLINE!

Saturday, January 11

10 AM-12 PM LIVE 

Includes printables! 

Buckle up, 2025, we’re coming for you.

And we’ve got sparkles! 

Let’s GOOOO!
